name: Lysandre Prism Star
effect: For each of your {R} Pokémon in play, put a card from your opponent’s discard pile in the Lost Zone.
author: Hitoshi Ariga
rule_box: You can’t have more than 1 Prism Star card with the same name in your deck. If a Prism Star card would go to the discard pile, put it in the Lost Zone instead.
